structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

text.section: The council shall select and contract with a public institution of higher education to carry out the provisions of KRS 164.981 to 164.9819.

law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 134, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 221, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
